text: You are attacking Legions of Nagashizzar!
You are defending against Legions of Nagashizzar!

[[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]] Use Warpstone to power Nagash's rituals.\\nGather Warpstone from marked mines[[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]] around the world.||[[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_lore_nagash_raise_the_dead.png]][[/img]]Has access to powerful lore of Undeath ||[[img:trait_set_nagash]][[/img]] [[img:res_nag_coast]][[/img]][[img:res_nag_counts]][[/img]][[img:res_nag_nagash]][[/img]][[img:res_nag_nehek]][[/img]] Collect Powerful Mortarchs around the world. Powerful horde armies can bide their time around Nagashizzar and outposts until the Black Pyramid and Nagash himself can be restored to their full power.||[[img:bullet_vmp_units]][[/img]]Varied unit roster with flying units, monsters, and Undead troops from Nagashizzar, Nehekhara, and Mortarch forces.

NAGASH IS NOT WEAK! However, he has only just coalesced back into shape in the secrecy of Nagashizzar, and for the moment he is but a shade of himself. His great resurgence is in motion, and it goes through consolidating his legions within the fortress of Nagashizzar, eliminating any nearby ratman who might reveal his presence. After that, westwards, through Nehekhara, letting Arkhan join his forces, and reminding all the other Mortarchs, and the world, that Nagash is back...

Upon his dark throne within the impregnable fortress Nagashizzar, the Great Necromancer did bide his time. But as the Dark Gods stir far away in the twisted lands of the North, a broken, desiccated husk is finally pulled from its deep slumber.\\n\\nProdded into motion by the impending doom threatening the world, the Supreme Lord of Death rises. Even whilst not yet returned to his full strength, his might cannot be denied. And his power will only grow.\\n\\nGathering his minions, from humble zombies to formidable Mortarch, an unstoppable tide of rotten flesh, dried bones, and unbound spirits threaten to engulf mortals and immortals alike.\\n\\nIt is not Chaos that shall inherit the world. It is Death.\\n\\nNagash is coming.
